dimensions: A: Warp: 76.5 cm (30 1/4 in.) Weft: 51 cm (20 in.) Both side edges cut. B: Warp: 76 cm (30 in.). Weft: 71 cm (28 in.) Left selvedge present; right edge cut. Pattern: Height of repeat: 48 cm (19 in.)
title: Vive France
provenance: Formerly in the collection of Elinor Merrell where it was No. 17 on her list of chefs de piece.
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
description: Panel printed in sepia on natural. Scenes of a medieval battle and the personification of France at peace in the center; two scenes at left, "L'Ordre du depart" (Orders to Leave) and "Le Retour" (The return) and two at right, "Le depart" (The Departure) and "Le Repos de Guerrier" (Warrier at Peace) illustrate a narrative. Neither of the two pieces seamed in the middle contains the full repeat.
name: Textile with chef de piece
